Your Healthcare. Your Team. On Your Time.LUX Health Network is the first multidisciplinary medical concierge to meld renowned internists and specialists for an exclusive, highly coordinated healthcare that complements your lifestyle. To deepen your experience, LUX clients receive comprehensive access to our network of 40 esteemed physicians, attentive client relations team, as well as traditional concierge amenities for a truly personalized wellness plan.

Selecting a hospice service for yourself or a loved one can be an emotionally daunting process. At Comfort Choice, we provide compassionate care to help make the transition more pleasant. With expert interdisciplinary services, patients are able to stay in the comfort of their homes for as long as possible.

The Doctor's Choice is a leading multispecialty home health agency delivering exceptional in-home and custodial services to residents across Los Angeles. Our dedicated and well-experienced staff works tirelessly to meet the needs of our patients and their families.

Our name says it all. We are a team of solicitous caregivers and skilled nurses who have made it our mission to aid people with daily tasks. Our scope of services include personal care, meal preparation, medication reminders, companionship, and grooming. We do our best to help patients maintain their independence and peace of mind.

summary: As a thought leader, I believe in simplifying laborious tasks for physicians and their staff to keep patient care as the primary focus, not billing and insurance nonsense. Being raised in a family of physicians, I'm well-acquainted with pesky day-to-day chores that create a bottleneck in most practices. To help alleviate this constant obstacle, I've successfully spearheaded healthcare-oriented ventures that provide a reliable and efficient outsourcing platform to relieve medical practices of administrative burdens.  At LUX Health Network, our vision is to reinvent the way consumers access healthcare. We open our unprecedented network of elite primary and specialty care physicians to our clients for a truly exclusive, highly coordinated concierge experience. We've created a unique model that complements your lifestyle and medical needs. We do the work so you won’t have to.  At Nexus Healthcare Solutions, we implement processes that help medical practices take care of all back-end operations. From billing to consulting, we take pride in our prompt, comprehensive, and professional delivery. Treating patients is your business, running a practice is ours.    The Right Choice Caregiving, The Doctor’s Choice Home Health, and The Comfort Choice Hospice were established to care not only for patients but also their families. Our experienced team and skilled nurses and therapists create a comforting, safe, and supportive environment to help you acclimatize to the changes brought on by life-threatening maladies.   Specialties: Managed Services, Serial Entrepreneur, Healthcare Consulting Services, Sales and Marketing, Health and Wellness Services
